ComicInfo.Title: The Ducks; What Th’ Ding Dong?
ComicInfo.Summary:
36 pages (including the 4 cover pages) of illustrations, crobards and comics focusing on the author’s sexual fantasies.
Contents“What Th’ Ding Dong?” (1 p., Comic Story).“The Pressure’s On…” (1 p., Comic Story).“Always Clowning Around” (2 p., Illustration with text).“Imaginary Girl” (2 p., Illustration).“Dream about Joan” (1 p., Illustration with text).“This’s one way ta shut ‘er up…” (1 p., Illustration with text).“The Devil Made Me Draw It” (1 p., Illustration with text).“Sexist Sketch for the Week” (1985) (1 p., Illustration with text).“Moments of Glory” (1 p., Illustration with text).“Big Sad Eyes…” (1 p., Illustration with text).“Shelf” (1989) (1 p., Illustration with text).“The Dreamer” (1 p., Illustration with text).“Typical Boring Booshwah Soap Opera” (1 p., Illustration with text).“Catholic School Girls” (1979) (1 p., Illustration with text).“It comes down to this.” (1980) (1 p., Illustration with text).“Aline” (1981) (1 p., Illustration with text).“The Thrill of Seeing Her Lose It!” (1 p., Illustration).“All the Pretty Horses” (1 p., Illustration with text).“Devil Girl” (3 p., Illustrations with text).He’s a Naughty Little Nigger” (1 p., Illustration with text).“Body Language” (1 p., Illustration).Don’t Try to Be Witty… Or Clever… (1 p., Illustration with text).“The Healthy […] Specimen” (2 p., Illustrations with text).“My Personal Struggle Against the Vulture Demonesses Goes On!” (3 p., Illustrations with text).“Helping the Amazon” (1 p., Illustration with text).“The Ducks” (1 p., Comic Story).“Untitled” (1 p., Illustration with text).“Cessation of Desire” (1 p., Illustration with text on Cover Back).
